itemInfo.itemDesc:
A spicy dish with stir-fried hot peppers and vegetables. 

- Unique Effect: Jump Height Increase for 30 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Olive Oil
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Cabbage
item.desc: A plump cabbage used as an ingredient in Cooking.\nUsage: Stir-Fried Vegetables, Fried Vegetables, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Cabbage using Bare Hands.

item.name: Olive Oil
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Hot Pepper
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Stir-Fried Vegetables, Stir Fried Meat, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Hot Pepper Seeds in a Garden.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.

item.name: Salt
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Onion
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Oatmeal, Stir-Fried Meat, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Onion Seeds in a Garden.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.
